alert.note: Alert for Shelby; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 11:28AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Mississippi, Tipton and north central Shelby Counties through NOON CDT... At 1128 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dixonville, or near Wilson, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Covington, Wilson, Munford, Brighton, Dixonville, Tipton, Atoka, Mason, Gilt Edge, Burlison, Garland, Egypt, Evadale, Quito, Golden Lake, Idaville, Beaver, Randolph, Delpro and Canaan Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
